name: Swedish Brown Beans
keywords: golden syrup, swedish brown beans, vinegar, side dish, vegan, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 cups Swedish brown beans or red kidney beans (canned red kidney beans can be used to avoid preliminary cooking)
1/4 cup golden syrup or to taste (dark Karo syrup can be substituted)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse dry beans, if used, and add water and salt. Simmer until tender, 1 to 2 hours. Add more water if beans tend to boil dry.
When cooked, add syrup and vinegar, adjust seasonings and serve hot. Dish can be prepared day before.
